title: First-team debut (the spark)
summary: A young playmaker steps into the spotlight — quick feet, quicker decisions.
detail: This milestone is a storytelling nod to the beginning of an era. Use it to test card rendering and modal focus management. The details panel includes a tracepoint button.

title: Triangles, tempo, and the press
summary: Short passing + high pressure becomes a signature rhythm.
detail: The football is a metaphor here: tight triangles and tempo shifts. In your profiler, track how filtering/searching updates the list.

title: Peak output season
summary: Goal bursts, assists, and that half-space glide — a data explosion.
detail: This entry is intentionally 'big' and wordier so the modal has more to render. It’s also a good candidate for measuring layout and paint in your RUM tools.

title: Adapting to new shapes
summary: Different systems, same gravity: defenders still collapse inward.
detail: Use this milestone to test route-to-modal interactions and how your scripts label page groups versus sub-views.

title: A front line that bends defenses
summary: Combination play, quick finishes, and assists that look like magic.
detail: Again: storytelling over strict history. The main goal is UI variety and interaction capture.

title: The creator phase
summary: Deeper drops, longer passes, and playmaking that starts earlier.
detail: This milestone represents the shift from constant sprinting to orchestration. Measure scroll + modal open for a longer list.

title: Leadership under pressure
summary: When systems wobble, individual brilliance becomes the stabilizer.
detail: Use this to test filtering by stage (Legacy) and searching by keywords (leadership).

title: The #10 mythos
summary: A cultural imprint: streets, murals, and endless highlight reels.
detail: This entry is intentionally abstract. It’s here to give the timeline a narrative arc while keeping assets copyright-safe.
